node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `notified` ( `notified_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `args` text NOT NULL, `notification_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `notified_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `is_seen` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `reference_notified_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`notified_id`), KEY `user_seen` (`user_id`,`is_seen`), KEY `reference_notified_id` (`reference_notified_id`), KEY `reference_notified_id__user_id__is_seen` (`reference_notified_id`,`user_id`,`is_seen`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=213848 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
node.title: notified
